subject: Re: Order #SSN5675 confirmed
description_text: Hello, Can you tell me where my order is now? I ordered it on Januar 2nd. The delivery Link doesnt work. Thank you Best regards Gesendet von Outlook für Android Von: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> Gesendet: Freitag, Januar 2, 2026 11:33:32 PM An: sascha@welter.koeln <sascha@welter.koeln> Betreff: Order #SSN5675 confirmed SIMSONN Order #SSN5675 Thank you for your purchase! We're getting your order ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent. View your order or Visit our store Order summary Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional × 1 Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate €328,29 1 × Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate 1 × Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) Subtotal €328,29 Shipping €26,95 Taxes €0,00 Total €355,24 EUR Customer information Shipping address Sascha Welter Fühlinger Kirchweg 82 50769 KÖLN Germany Billing address Sascha Welter Fühlinger Kirchweg 82 50769 KÖLN Germany Payment Paypal Shipping method Express Shipping If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Sascha Welter,     We apologize for the delay. Your order was shipped yesterday. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224804910
